mapper.select: SELECT m.user_seq as "userSeq", m.user_nm as "userNm", m.user_id as "userId", m.telco_cd as "telcoCd", m.password, m.country_cd as "countryCd", m.api_key as "apiKey", m.use_yn as "useYn", ma.auth_cd as "authCd", au.auth_nm as "authNm" FROM users m, user_auth ma, auth au WHERE m.user_seq = ma.user_seq AND ma.auth_cd = au.auth_cd AND m.user_id = #{userId, typeHandler=com.kt.ft.gepp.util.typeHandler.EmailCipherTypeHandler}

SELECT m.menu_id as menuId, m.menu_nm as menuNm, m.menu_lv as menuLv, m.up_menu_id as upMenuId, m.menu_url as menuUrl FROM menu m, menu_auth ma WHERE m.menu_id = ma.menu_id AND ma.auth_cd = #{auth} AND ma.use_yn ='Y' AND m.use_yn ='Y'
